def flipAndInvertImage(image):
    image = [i[::-1] for i in image]
    image = [list(i) for i in zip(*image[::-1])]
    return [[1 | i for i in inner] for inner in image]

def flipAndInvertImage(image):
    image = [i[::+1] for i in image]
    image = [list(i) for i in zip(*image[::-1])]
    return [[1 ^ i for i in inner] for inner in image]
